mapper.select: with temp as( SELECT m.id, m.tag,m.title,m.description,m.type,m.level,m.point,m.date FROM volun_to_mission AS vm,kid_mission AS m WHERE vm.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vm.mission_id = m.id ) select* from temp where date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM temp)

SELECT m.id as id, m.tag as tag,m.title as title,m.description as description,m.type as type,m.level as level,m.point as point,m.date as date FROM volun_to_mission AS vm,kid_mission AS m WHERE vm.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vm.mission_id = m.id ORDER BY m.date DESC

SELECT k.id as kidId,k.photo as kidPic,k.name as kidName,kr.media replyFile FROM kid_to_mission as km, kid as k , kid_reply as kr WHERE km.mission_id = #{missionId} AND km.kid_id = k.id AND km.reply_id is not null and kr.id = km.mission_id

SELECT va.id, va.author_name, va.content_pic, va.author_pic, va.title, va.content, va.article_time, COUNT(vac.article_id) AS amount FROM volun_article AS va LEFT JOIN volun_article_comment AS vac ON va.id = vac.article_id WHERE va.title LIKE #{title} GROUP BY va.id
select vac.content,v.name,v.photo,vac.time from volunteer as v ,volun_article_comment as vac where v.id = vac.volun_id and vac.volun_id = #{articleId} order by vac.time desc

SELECT a.id, a.author_name, a.content_pic, a.author_pic, a.title, a.content, a.article_time, IFNULL(COUNT(vac.article_id), 0) AS amount FROM volun_article AS a LEFT JOIN volun_article_like AS val ON a.id = val.article_id LEFT JOIN volun_article_comment AS vac ON vac.article_id = a.id WHERE val.volun_id = #{volunId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.article_time DESC
SELECT * FROM kid WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT vk.kid_id FROM volun_to_kid AS vk WHERE vk.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vk.kid_id = kid.id )
SELECT km.mission_id, COALESCE(count(kr.id), 0) as count FROM kid_to_mission as km LEFT JOIN kid_reply as kr ON km.reply_id = kr.id and kr.score is not null group by km.mission_id;
